comments: A pangram is a sentence using every letter of the alphabet at least once.
It is the track's responsibility to add further language specific tests, like:
referential transparency (i.e. evaluating, a function/method gives the same value for same arguments every time.)
'error' and 'null' should be treated according to the languages' specifics and possibilities.

cases.description: checks if the given string is a pangram.
comments: Output should be a boolean denoting if the string is a pangram or not.

cases.description: returns false for an empty message.
recognizes a perfect lower case pangram.
recognizes lower case pangram with spaces.
cases.input: few quips galvanized the mock jury box
a quick movement of the enemy will jeopardize five gunboats
five boxing wizards jump quickly at it
THE QUICK BROWN FOX JUMPS OVER THE LAZY DOG

cases.description: recognizes a missing character in upper-case, e.g. 'G'.
cases.input: THE QUICK BROWN FOX JUMPS OVER THE LAZY DOLL
ThE FiVe bOxInG WiZaRdS JuMp qUiCkLy

cases.description: recognizes a missing character in mixed-case, e.g. 'Y'.
cases.input: ThE FiVe bOxInG WiZaRdS JuMp qUiCkL

cases.description: recognizes a pangram with special characters.
recognizes missing characters (e.g. 'o') with special characters present.
